ETYMOLOGY: From Latin digitus ('finger, toe'), referring to counting using the fingers.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Any of the numerals from 0 to 9, especially when forming part of a larger number or code.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 零到九的任一数字符号，尤其指构成一个更大数或代码的一部分。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please verify that you have entered all twelve digits of the security code correctly.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请核实您正确输入了安全码的所有十二个数字。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A finger, toe, or corresponding part in other vertebrates.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 手指、脚趾，或在其他脊椎动物中对应的肢体末端部分。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The salamander possesses four digits on its front feet and five on its hind feet.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 蝾螈的前脚有四根趾，后脚有五根趾。

REGISTER: General, Formal (in anatomical or technical contexts)
